gen:link.msg:message: `DescriptionLocationAbroad` MUST NOT be reported, because `PlaceOfResidenceNL` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_EntityAddress_PrtExistenceThnNoExistenceCovA8_PlaceOfResidenceNL')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_EntityAddress_PrtExistenceThnNoExistenceCovA8_PlaceOfResidenceNL return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_EntityAddress_PrtExistenceThnNoExistenceCovA8_DescriptionLocationAbroad')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_EntityAddress_PrtExistenceThnNoExistenceCovA8_DescriptionLocationAbroad return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
